trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor base class for Web server controls that are derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um editor de componente a classe base para controles de servidor Web que derivam de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A component editor provides a user interface for editing the properties of a control.
trans-unit.target: Um editor de componente fornece uma interface de usuário para editar as propriedades de um controle.

trans-unit.source: Component editors are invoked from control designers by using the **Property Builder** menu item from the context menu on the control.
trans-unit.target: Editores de componente são chamados de designers de controle usando o **propriedade construtor** item de menu no menu de contexto do controle.

trans-unit.source: Component editors that are derived from the BaseDataListComponentEditor class are invoked from designers derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class, and are used to edit the properties of controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: Editores de componente que são derivados da classe BaseDataListComponentEditor são chamados de designers derivados de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>classe e são usados para editar as propriedades de controles que são derivadas da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> de</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: For examples of such controls, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter exemplos de tais controles, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method displays a component editor for the associated control, if one can be created.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>método exibe um editor de componente para o controle associado, se ele pode ser criado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.GetInitialComponentEditorPageIndex%2A> method returns the index of the initial page to be displayed in the component editor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.GetInitialComponentEditorPageIndex%2A>método retorna o índice da página inicial a ser exibida no editor de componente.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.GetInitialComponentEditorPageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A designer that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class creates a component editor that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> class, when the user selects **Property Builder** from the context menu within the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um designer que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>classe cria um editor de componente que é derivado do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor>classe, quando o usuário seleciona **propriedade construtor** no menu de contexto dentro do designer.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The index in the array of page control types, of the initial page to display.
trans-unit.target: O índice na matriz de tipos de controle de página da página inicial para exibir.

trans-unit.source: Edits the specified component by using the specified context descriptor and parent window.
trans-unit.target: Edita o componente especificado usando a janela pai e o descritor de contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method gets a <xref:System.Type> array of page control types by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>método obtém um <xref:System.Type>matriz de tipos de controle de página usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm> object, and then calls its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm.ShowForm%2A> method to display the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Ele cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm>objeto e, em seguida, chama seus <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm.ShowForm%2A>método para exibir o editor de componente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm.ShowForm%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> objeto que pode ser usado para obter informações de contexto adicional.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> implementing the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>, which represents the component to edit.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>Implementando o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>, que representa o componente para editar</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window"></xref> that represents the parent window.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window"> </xref> que representa a janela pai.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> the component was successfully edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>o componente foi editado com êxito; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the initial page to display in the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o índice da página inicial para exibir no editor do componente.

trans-unit.source: The initial page is specified when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> object is created.
trans-unit.target: A página inicial é especificada quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor>objeto é criado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor>

trans-unit.source: The index of the initial page in the array.
trans-unit.target: O índice da página inicial na matriz.
